experiences.description: Developed and maintained data pipelines for various internal applications. Focused on improving data quality and reliability. Used Python, SQL, and basic ETL processes to transform and load data from various sources into the data warehouse.

Designed and implemented scalable data pipelines using Spark and Hadoop. Worked with large datasets to support business intelligence and analytics initiatives. Improved data infrastructure performance by optimizing query execution and data storage. Migrated legacy data systems to AWS cloud platform.

Led the design and implementation of a new data platform based on Kafka and AWS services (S3, Redshift, EMR). Responsible for ensuring data quality, security, and compliance. Mentored junior data engineers and provided technical guidance on best practices for data engineering. Implemented data governance policies and procedures. Developed real-time data ingestion pipelines for fraud detection and risk management.

education.degree: B.Eng. in Electrical Engineering and Computer Science
education.description: Graduated with honors. Focused on database systems and data structures.
Specialized in data science and analytics. Coursework included machine learning, data mining, and business intelligence. Conducted research on large-scale data analysis and visualization.
